QuestData.Title: WANTED: Foreman Wellson
QuestData.Description: Foreman Wellson has been a pain in our side since we got here. His shipyard holds a large amount of supplies that would be extremely useful to us... if we could get to them.$b$bHe keeps a close watch over his minions and makes it very difficult for us to get a foothold on the shipyard. I need you to take out Wellson for good this time. Be careful $n, we have been receiving reports of dirty Alliance all around the area.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Once a great man, Foreman Wellson has fallen from grace.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Foreman Wellson at the Wellson Shipyard. The shipyard can be found north of here, on the western coast.
QuestData.RewardText: Great work $n. I will report your efforts to our highest in command immediately.
